title: Orthogonal color bases for exotic representations
abstract:
A complication in the treatment of any strongly charged particle is the SU(3)
color structure. For the standard model quarks antiquarks and gluons there are
various well-known strategies for dealing with the color structure, including
orthogonal multiplet bases. For exotic representations, beyond triplets,
antitriplets and octets, non-orthogonal bases have been systematically worked
out only recently. In this letter we demonstrate how to construct orthogonal
multiplet bases also for processes including exotic representations.
